def verify_domain_identity(self, domain_name): """ Starts verification of a domain identity. To complete verification, you must create a TXT record with a specific format through your DNS provider.
For more information, see *Verifying a domain with Amazon SES* in the Amazon SES documentation: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/ses/latest/DeveloperGuide/verify-domain-procedure.html
:param domain_name: The name of the domain to verify. :return: The token to include in the TXT record with your DNS provider. """ try: response = self.ses_client.verify_domain_identity(Domain=domain_name) token = response['VerificationToken'] logger.info("Got domain verification token for %s.", domain_name) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't verify domain %s.", domain_name) raise else: return token
